item.description:
Repost from inquirerdotnet https://twitter.com/inquirerdotnet/statuses/1067970049464389634/:

@krixiasINQ @LeilasINQ Perhaps one of the most striking parts of Judge Rodolfo Azucena’s verdict convicting PO3 Oares, PO1 Pereda and PO1 Cruz of murder over Kian delos Santos’ death: “The public peace is never predicated on the cost of human life.” #JusticeForKian | @krixiasINQ
